response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "Young adults are generally at a medium risk due to developmental instability and peer influence."),
    ("race", "low", "White males do not typically show significant disparities in recidivism rates compared to other races."),
    ("arrest_count", "low", "One arrest indicates lower cumulative exposure to criminal justice system."),
    ("conviction", "medium", "Conviction increases risk due to entry into criminal record."),
    ("height_and_weight", "low", "Physical characteristics do not directly correlate with recidivism."),
    ("marital_status", "low", "Living alone and never married may slightly increase risk due to less social stability."),
    ("education_level", "low", "High school diploma with college enrollment suggests lower risk due to higher education attainment."),
    ("employment_history", "low", "Having held 2 jobs indicates stability and responsibility."),
    ("drug_use", "medium", "Marijuana use within the past four years indicates some risk, but not as high as other substances."),
    ("depression", "low", "No recent depression symptoms suggests lower risk of recidivism."),
    ("family_history", "medium", "Growing up in a household of size 6 in an urban area may indicate exposure to risk factors."),
    ("spiritual_beliefs", "low", "Belief in a higher power influencing personal life may provide moral guidance and reduce risk."),
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 60
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs between 175 and 199 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 2-year college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
